Hyperbolic Deep Learning in the Age of LLMs

  • Hyperbolic Deep Learning in the Age of LLMs

    By leveraging hyperbolic space's unique properties, we aim to develop more efficient, scalable, and expressive models that can better understand and process complex data, leading to advancements in various applications.
